channel.title: Help Me!
channel.description:
I did not buy Minecraft, but I downloaded coonhunters client. It doesn't allow me to play online like it says it does. I go to multiplayer>add server>minecraft.net>done Then, when I look back at the server I added it says communication error. Any ides on whats wrong? I can't afford Minecraft and this is my thrid day playing so sorry if I'm doing something wrong and don't even know it. Help me ASAP pl0x0rzzzz!!!!!
Thanks, Chris
EDIT: When I try to login to that server anyway it says Failed to connect to server Connection refused:connect

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Is there supposed to be a space after the address?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Chaos Owner Chaos
item.description:
@Owner_Chaos wrote:

yeah lol my bad
and your server says when i type exactly this in the box
davidscape.org :25566

says cant resolve hostname

Read full topic

item.title: Help Me!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Did you try moparcraft.net, not minecraft.net?

Also I’m pretty sure we’re not upgraded to 1.8 yet, so you wont be able to play until we do. I have a 1.8 server running though at davidscape.org port 25566

Read full topic
